DECK.ERROR: Something broke! Check Console for more information.

CARD.drawFaceUp.name: Draw Cards Face Up?
CARD.drawFaceUp.nameHint: Set to false to 'draw blind' (cards appear face down).

CARD.scale.name: Card Scale Ratio
CARD.scale.nameHint: Adjust the size of card tiles in play. Values less than 1 make the cards smaller.

CARD.chbPrimaryColor.name: Player Hand Color:
CARD.chbPrimaryColor.nameHint: Background color for the player's hand.

CARD.chbBorderColor.name: Player Hand Border Color:
CARD.chbBorderColor.nameHint: Border color of each card in hand.

CARD.chbBorderColorActive.name: Player Hand Highlight Color:
CARD.chbBorderColorActive.nameHint: Border color of card in hand when hovered.

CARD.chbXPos.name: Player Hand Horizontal Position
CARD.chbXPos.nameHint: Higher values are further to the right of the screen horizontally.

CARD.chbYPos.name: Player Hand Vertical Position
CARD.chbYPos.nameHint: Higher values are further up the screen vertically.
